abstract: Goldman Sachs disclosed in regulatory filings that several top company executives, including Lloyd C. Blankfein, exercised stock options this week and earned millions of dollars in profits by selling the firm’s shares.
snippet: Goldman Sachs disclosed in regulatory filings that several top company executives, including Lloyd C. Blankfein, exercised stock options this week and earned millions of dollars in profits by selling the firm’s shares.
lead_paragraph: Goldman Sachs disclosed in regulatory filings late Friday that several top company executives, including Lloyd C. Blankfein, left, its chairman and chief executive, exercised stock options this week and earned millions of dollars in profits by selling the firm’s shares, Reuters reports.

headline.main: Top Goldman Executives Earn Millions From Options
